name: Bhavesh Kalluru
trust: CI/CD for ML (GitHub Actions, Docker, MLflow)
about: GenAI and AI Engineer with hands‑on experience taking NLP and ML systems from notebooks to production, with a focus on fast iteration, reliability, and measurable impact.
highlights: Reduced prompt-engineering effort by ~90% via Smart Prompter (GPT + NLP)
Cut model inference latency by 45% with streaming pipeline (Kafka + TF Serving)
Improved training speed 60% by optimizing feature store + parallel pipelines
Deployed REST APIs for ML with FastAPI & Docker; integrated into dashboards
Designed AUC/ROC‑driven evals; production systems at millions of datapoints/day

experience.title: AI Engineer
experience.impact: Built Smart Prompter (GPT‑powered prompt generator) cutting prompt‑engineering time ~90%; implemented intent classification & refinement loop; shipped intuitive UI for technical & non‑technical users.

experience.title: Assistant System Engineer
experience.impact: Developed ML models (regression/classification/clustering) and DL (TensorFlow/PyTorch) for banking & telecom; automated pipelines; built FastAPI services; drove robust evaluation (AUC/ROC, PR).

experience.title: ML Engineer Intern
experience.impact: Deployed real‑time ML with Kafka + TF Serving (‑45% latency); improved training speed 60%; built CI/CD for ML (GitHub Actions, Docker, MLflow); anomaly detection (Autoencoders, Isolation Forests).

projects.name: Smart Prompter
projects.summary: AI‑powered prompt generator turning short keywords into optimized prompts; uses intent classification and refinement for consistent high‑quality LLM outputs.

projects.name: Lyra AI Assistant (macOS)
projects.summary: Lightweight desktop assistant (Python + Tkinter) for notes, summaries, and Q&A with local‑first UI.

projects.name: Brand Catcher Game
projects.summary: Interactive Python game for brand recognition with score tracking and adaptive difficulty.

projects.name: YouTube Summarization (Gemini LLM)
projects.summary: Automated pipeline to extract transcripts and produce concise summaries via LLM; deployable across Slack/Chrome/dashboards.

projects.name: Data Professionals Survey Dashboard
